Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: aur allaah kee yaad mein ginatee ke ye kuchh din vyateet karo. phir jo koee jaldee karake do hee din mein kooch kare to isamen usapar koee gunaah nahin. aur jo thahara rahe to isamen bhee usapar koee gunaah nahin. yah usake liee hai jo allaah ka dar rakhe. aur allaah ka dar rakho aur jaan rakho ki usee ke paas tum ikattha hoge

logon mein koee to aisa hai ki is saansaarik jeevan ke vishay mein usakee baate tumhen bahut bhaatee hai, us (khot) ke baavajood jo usake dil mein hotee hai, vah allaah ko gavaah thaharaata hai aur jhagade mein vah bada hathee hai
aur jab vah lautata hai, to dharatee mein isalie daud-dhoop karata hai ki isamen bigaad paida kare aur khetee aur nasl ko tabaah kare, jabaki allaah bigaad ko pasand nahin karata
aur jab usase kaha jaata hai, "allaah se dar", to ahankaar use aur gunaah par jama deta hai. atah usake lie to jahannam hee kaafee hai, aur vah bahut-hee buree shayya hai
aur logon mein vah bhee hai jo allaah kee prasannata ke sansaadhan kee chaah mein apanee jaan khata deta hai. allaah bhee apane aise bandon ke prati atyant karunaasheel hai
ai eemaan laanevaalo! tum sab islaam mein daakhil ho jao aur shaitaan ke padachinh par na chalo. vah to tumhaara khula hua shatru hai
phir yadi tum un spashta daleelon ke pashchaat bhee, jo tumhaare paas aa chukee hai, phisal gae, to bhalee-bhaanti jaan rakho ki allaah atyant prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai

kya ve (isaraeel kee santaan) bas isakee prateeksha kar rahe hai ki allaah svayan hee baadalon kee chhaayon mein unake saamane aa jae aur farishte bhee, haalaanki baat tay kar dee gaee hai? maamale to allaah hee kee or lautate hai
